chapters.title: Chapter 2:  A Wish Fulfilled
chapters.info: Tamra Ospenya, p. 28—Watcher of the Seals, the Flame of Tar Valon, the Amyrlin Seat. She was raised from the Blue Ajah. She is always fair and just, which are not necessarily the same thing. It is said that her stare can make stones move. Her Keeper of the Chronicles is Gitara Moroso, also raised from the Blue Ajah. See also Amyrlin Seat; Moroso, Gitara; Vayu, Sierin.
